name.en: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.jp: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.thai: A Day in the Life of Serika
name.ko: A Day in the Life of Serika

desc.en: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.thai: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.ko: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_tw: 老師和對策委員會學生們跟蹤茜香，來到她打工的拉麵店。大家吃了拉麵度過愉快的時光，可是茜香依然一副沒好氣的樣子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被頭盔團綁架。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪芹香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是芹香依然一副没好气的样子。芹香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。

desc.en: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.jp: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.thai: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.ko: Sensei bumped into Serika and greeted her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodged but was followed by Sensei closely; she later admitted that she was going to part-time jobs and asked Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei didn't listen.
desc.zh_tw: 老師撞見了茜香，向她親切地問好，並表示想知道她去哪裡、做什麼。茜香躲閃著，但老師步步緊跟；茜香後承認是打工，並要求老師不再跟隨，但老師並沒有聽從。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师撞见了芹香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。芹香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；芹香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师撞见了茜香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。茜香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；茜香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师撞见了茜香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。茜香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；茜香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。

desc.en: Sensei brought others at the FTF to the very ramen store that Serika was working for. Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.jp: Sensei brought others at the FTF to the very ramen store that Serika was working for. Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.thai: Sensei brought others at the FTF to the very ramen store that Serika was working for. Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.ko: Sensei brought others at the FTF to the very ramen store that Serika was working for. Though surprised, Serika led the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposed to pay with her cards, but Sensei did that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returned to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.
desc.zh_tw: 老師帶著對策委員會的其它人來到了茜香打工的拉麵店，茜香大為震撼。然後，茜香帶領大家就坐；之後，野乃美主動提出結賬，但老師最終還是用大人的卡片結了賬。吃飽後，大家在茜香的難堪與強烈要求下返回了學校。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了芹香打工的拉面店，芹香大为震撼。然后，芹香带领大家就坐；之后，野宫主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在芹香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了茜香打工的拉面店，茜香大为震撼。然后，茜香带领大家就坐；之后，野乃美主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在茜香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了茜香打工的拉面店，茜香大为震撼。然后，茜香带领大家就坐；之后，野乃美主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在茜香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.thai: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.ko: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_tw: 柴大將是一位在阿拜多斯校區附近經營著一個名叫“柴犬拉麵”的餐廳老闆，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.
desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會的定期會議日。學生們左思右想償還9億日圓的方法，但卻想不到好辦法。老師和學生們結束會議後去吃拉麵，結果卻遇到窮困潦倒的便利屋職員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会的定期会议日。学生们左思右想偿还9亿日圆的方法，但却想不到好办法。老师和学生们结束会议后去吃拉面，结果却遇到穷困潦倒的便利屋职员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对策委员会的定期会议日。学生们左思右想偿还9亿日圆的方法，但却想不到好办法。老师和学生们结束会议后去吃拉面，结果却遇到穷困潦倒的便利屋职员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会的定期会议日。学生们左思右想偿还9亿日圆的方法，但却想不到好办法。老师和学生们结束会议后去吃拉面，结果却遇到穷困潦倒的便利屋职员。

desc.en: The regular meeting for Abydos's Foreclosure Task Force began, as everyone purposed their own way to pay the debt.
desc.jp: The regular meeting for Abydos's Foreclosure Task Force began, as everyone purposed their own way to pay the debt.
desc.thai: The regular meeting for Abydos's Foreclosure Task Force began, as everyone purposed their own way to pay the debt.
desc.ko: The regular meeting for Abydos's Foreclosure Task Force began, as everyone purposed their own way to pay the debt.
desc.zh_tw: 阿拜多斯對策委員會的日常會議開始，大家紛紛提出自己的對於還債的具體方法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿拜多斯对策委员会的日常会议开始，大家纷纷提出自己的对于还债的具体方法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阿拜多斯对策委员会的日常会议开始，大家纷纷提出自己的对于还债的具体方法。

desc.en: Serika found an ad concerning a bracelet that will make everyone luckier. But it was soon discovered to be a Pyramid Scheme by others.
desc.jp: Serika found an ad concerning a bracelet that will make everyone luckier. But it was soon discovered to be a Pyramid Scheme by others.

desc.zh_tw: 芹香在街上找到了一個廣告傳單，聲稱售賣能令人運氣更好的手鐲，但很快被眾人認出實為傳銷。

desc.en: Hoshino pointed out that the root cause of being unable to pay is because of the students left. Therefore it'll be fine as soon as they hijacked students from other schools. Denied by Ayane.
desc.jp: Hoshino pointed out that the root cause of being unable to pay is because of the students left. Therefore it'll be fine as soon as they hijacked students from other schools. Denied by Ayane.
desc.thai: Hoshino pointed out that the root cause of being unable to pay is because of the students left. Therefore it'll be fine as soon as they hijacked students from other schools. Denied by Ayane.
desc.ko: Hoshino pointed out that the root cause of being unable to pay is because of the students left. Therefore it'll be fine as soon as they hijacked students from other schools. Denied by Ayane.
desc.zh_tw: 星野指出，阿拜多斯還不起債的根本在於學生出走，因而只要把其他學校的學生劫持過來就好。被綾音否決。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野指出，阿拜多斯还不起债的根本在于学生出走，因而只要把其他学校的学生劫持过来就好。被绫音否决。

desc.en: Shiroko straighted to the plan of robbing a bank, saying that she had found out everyone and in that way, they would be able to earn 100 million in just five minutes. Criminal as it is, it was denied by Ayane and Serika.
desc.jp: Shiroko straighted to the plan of robbing a bank, saying that she had found out everyone and in that way, they would be able to earn 100 million in just five minutes. Criminal as it is, it was denied by Ayane and Serika.

desc.zh_tw: 白子開門見山地提出了搶銀行的計劃，表示對於銀行的種種都已經摸清，且五分鐘就能賺一個億。因為本身犯罪，被綾音和芹香駁回。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 白子开门见山地提出了抢银行的计划，表示对于银行的种种都已经摸清，且五分钟就能赚一个亿。因为本身犯罪，被绫音和芹香驳回。

desc.en: As the dispute erupted, Sensei was forced to make a choice. But even Sensei's choice disappointed Ayane and made her overturn the table angrily. Everyone was under a good lecture later.
desc.jp: As the dispute erupted, Sensei was forced to make a choice. But even Sensei's choice disappointed Ayane and made her overturn the table angrily. Everyone was under a good lecture later.
desc.thai: As the dispute erupted, Sensei was forced to make a choice. But even Sensei's choice disappointed Ayane and made her overturn the table angrily. Everyone was under a good lecture later.
desc.ko: As the dispute erupted, Sensei was forced to make a choice. But even Sensei's choice disappointed Ayane and made her overturn the table angrily. Everyone was under a good lecture later.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人爭執不下，於是讓老師做出選擇。但老師的選擇令綾音大失所望，怒掀桌子。之後所有人被好好說教了一番。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人争执不下，于是让老师做出选择。但老师的选择令绫音大失所望，怒掀桌子。之后所有人被好好说教了一番。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人争执不下，于是让老师做出选择。但老师的选择令绫音大失所望，怒掀桌子。之后所有人被好好说教了一番。

name.en: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.jp: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.thai: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.ko: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68

desc.en: Everyone decided to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it was there that they met the Problem Solver 68. Spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they could only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner took pity on them and gave them extra ramen. Aru talked with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identity of Abydos High School.
desc.jp: Everyone decided to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it was there that they met the Problem Solver 68. Spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they could only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner took pity on them and gave them extra ramen. Aru talked with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identity of Abydos High School.
desc.thai: Everyone decided to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it was there that they met the Problem Solver 68. Spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they could only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner took pity on them and gave them extra ramen. Aru talked with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identity of Abydos High School.
desc.ko: Everyone decided to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it was there that they met the Problem Solver 68. Spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they could only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner took pity on them and gave them extra ramen. Aru talked with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identity of Abydos High School.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人決定帶綾音去拉麵店吃飯，在那他們遇到了便利屋68全員。因為錢都花在了僱傭兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉麵；老闆可憐他們，於是給了他們加量的面。亞瑠跟對策委員會交談起來，絲毫沒意識到是阿拜多斯的人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利店68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利店68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。阿露跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利店68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利店68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。亚瑠跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利店68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利店68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。亚瑠跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。

desc.zh_tw: 柴大將是一位在阿拜多斯校區附近經營著一個名叫“柴犬拉麵”的餐廳老闆，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.jp: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.thai: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.ko: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠在柴關拉麵店吃拉麵時，聽了老闆的窩心鼓勵，終於承受不住良心的譴責而放聲喊叫。然而遙香卻誤解亞的喊叫，反而把炸彈裝在店裡，把柴關拉麵店炸得不留痕跡。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。

desc.en: The ramen restaurant owner mistook the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realized that it was the restaurant that prevented her being a real villain. Haruka, who was unsure of Aru's saying, blew up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.jp: The ramen restaurant owner mistook the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realized that it was the restaurant that prevented her being a real villain. Haruka, who was unsure of Aru's saying, blew up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.thai: The ramen restaurant owner mistook the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realized that it was the restaurant that prevented her being a real villain. Haruka, who was unsure of Aru's saying, blew up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.ko: The ramen restaurant owner mistook the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realized that it was the restaurant that prevented her being a real villain. Haruka, who was unsure of Aru's saying, blew up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.zh_tw: 拉麵店老闆錯認便利屋68為阿拜多斯的朋友，亞瑠突然間精神錯亂，認為是這家拉麵店阻礙了她成為真正的壞蛋。遙香尚未聽清就反手炸掉了拉麵店。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 拉面店老板错认便利屋68为阿拜多斯的朋友，阿露突然间领悟到了什么，认为是这家拉面店阻碍了她成为真正的坏蛋。遥香尚未听清就反手炸掉了拉面店。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 拉面店老板错认便利屋68为阿拜多斯的朋友，亚瑠突然间领悟到了什么，认为是这家拉面店阻碍了她成为真正的坏蛋。遥香尚未听清就反手炸掉了拉面店。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 拉面店老板错认便利屋68为阿拜多斯的朋友，亚瑠突然间领悟到了什么，认为是这家拉面店阻碍了她成为真正的坏蛋。遥香尚未听清就反手炸掉了拉面店。

desc.thai: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.

desc.zh_tw: 柴大將是一位在阿拜多斯校區附近經營著一個名叫“柴犬拉麵”的餐廳老闆，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。
